title: Natchez Trace Parkway: Do Business With Us
body: Do Business With Us       Special Use, Bus, and Filming Permits Permits may be required for commercial buses, filming, group bike rides, or other special uses on the Natchez Trace Parkway. Visit our Permits page to download applications, and get more information about permit requirements.   Freedom of Information Act The Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) is a law that gives you the right to access information from the federal government.To get information under the FOIA, typically you must make a "FOIA request." This FOIA request form allows you to describe the information you want from the Natchez Trace Parkway. When complete, you can fax the form to 662-680-4034 or mail the form to:  NATCHEZ TRACE PARKWAY ATTN: CHIEF RANGER 2680 NATCHEZ TRACE PARKWAY TUPELO, MS 38804   Visit our Our Staff and Offices Page to find the phone numbers of Headquarters employees who may be able to answer your questions about doing business with the park.
